item.title: Manifesto
item.description: When possible, I like to start my projects with a good manifesto. Decry the moral bankruptcy of my peers, chart out a course to utopia, that sort of thing. Here are the things that Compose aims to do that I feel buck the status quo to varying degrees. No files, no ASCII This has two major components: Compose programs will not be stored as a sequence of UTF-8 characters that are parsed into an AST.
